page.title: 07FARMING (cont)
page.content: Prosperous Farm situated south of Hungerford on the East side of the A338 consisting of 450 acres mainly chalky soil with part sand and clay, 350 acres being arable. They have a diary herd f 90 Guernseys and 30 followers. The milk goes to the Milk Marketing Board and the cream is sold locally and direct from the farm. The equipment for this farm consists of a combine harvester,three tractors, culitvators, haymaking, silage and spraying equipment. Four employers plus a student. Upper Slope Farm on the west side of the A338 is part of the Polesdon Estate. 4O acres are grassland let for grazing cattle and 15 arable. Farm buildings are redundant,the farm house occupied by the Manager. Standen Farm 44O acres with crops of barley,wheat,peas and a beef herd.
